original_title: American tourist found dead inside hotel room in Kalutara
original_body_lines: An American tourist has been found dead inside the room of a star-rated tourist hotel in Kalutara area, early this morning (Jan. 09), Kalutara-North Police said.
The deceased person has been identified to be aged 67, according to police.
Police have recovered the body of the American national inside the room number 324, in which he was staying, after being informed by the hotel management.
